subject: p17032538
Impression: AP chest compared to : Minimal edema persists in the left lung. Large region of consolidation inferior to the central lungs and pleural scarring has not cleared. Heart size is normal. ET tube is in standard placement. Feeding tube ends in the upper stomach. Denser right pleural thickening is chronic, but more pronounced today than in. No pneumothorax.
